name: @munbon/api-contracts
description: API contract definitions for Munbon Irrigation System

scripts.docs:generate: npx @redocly/cli build-docs openapi/auth-service.yaml -o dist/auth-service.html && npx @redocly/cli build-docs openapi/sensor-data-service.yaml -o dist/sensor-data.html && npx @redocly/cli build-docs openapi/water-control-service.yaml -o dist/water-control.html
scripts.generate:types: npx openapi-typescript openapi/auth-service.yaml -o types/auth.d.ts && npx openapi-typescript openapi/sensor-data-service.yaml -o types/sensor-data.d.ts && npx openapi-typescript openapi/water-control-service.yaml -o types/water-control.d.ts
